import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import './checkout-summary.styles.scss' import { selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' const CheckoutSummary = ({total}) => { return (

Summary

Subtotal ${total}
Estimated Delivery & Handling $0.00
Taxes --
Total ${total * 5}
Member Checkout
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutSummary)
